name: Clips & Coffee
description:
It seems that a certain intern has lost all of his papers! Now you, a piece of notebook paper, must use their paperclips to gather together all of the other pieces of paper. However, watch out for the coffee stains on the desk! Then your paper will get ruined. The more paper you have, the more funds you will receive for your project by the end of the game. I made this for my first ever game jam, so it's not as polished as I would like, but as long as I learn from it I'll be fine.

Please leave feedback at https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSepmAY2_cmhq0Dm-3K_R3p5_mo8cpvuJY0LnpVN...
